potioncapsule.tooltip.catalyst_1: Add this to the crafting grid to obtain more yields while attaching instant capsules
potioncapsule.tooltip.c_catalyst_2: Craft with capsule to apply creative effect on it
potioncapsule.tooltip.special_capsule_bi: Killer Queen the third bomb, BITE ZA DUSTO
potioncapsule.gui.gelatin_ex.zero_descr: Output slot is full or no matching recipe found
potioncapsule.gui.gelatin_form.zero_desc: Output slot is full or no matching recipe found
potioncapsule.jei_desc.jelly: Crafted in a Gelatin Former using apple and gelatin powder.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.capsule: Store a portion of potion, either consume one or put it into a Capsule Pendant to acquire the effect.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.capsule_instant: Store a portion of instant potion, either consume one or put it into a Capsule Pendant to acquire the effect.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.capsule_special: Special caupsule that has special effects.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.gelatin_powder: Can be extracted from items inside a Gelatin Extractor.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.pendant: Store capsules and automatically trigger them under some specific condition.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.wart_dust: Drop while harvesting mature nether wart, can be used to craft into Potion Capsule with gelatin powder inside a Gelatin Former.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.pendant_curio: Can be equipped in necklace slot (Curios)
potioncapsule.jei_desc.wart_dust_craft: Can also be obtained by decomposing nether wart.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.catalyst: Put into additional slots while attaching effects on Instant Capsules to increase the yield.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.c_catalyst: Craft with any Potion Capsule to make it creative.
potioncapsule.jei_desc.gel_former: Craft Gelatin Powder with other catalysts into items.
